entities.name: hogwarts
entities.description: The school where Harry, Ron, and Hermione are students. The Hogwarts ghosts provided entertainment for a feast.

entities.name: nearly headless nick
entities.description: A Gryffindor ghost who reenacted his own botched beheading during the feast.

entities.name: gryffindor
entities.description: One of the four houses at Hogwarts. Nearly Headless Nick is a Gryffindor ghost.

entities.name: malfoy
entities.description: A student who shouted through the crowd as they left the hall.

entities.name: dementors
entities.description: Creatures that send their love to Harry Potter.

entities.name: harry potter
entities.description: The main character who is being targeted by the dementors.

entities.name: ron
entities.description: Harry's friend who is also a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Harry's friend who is also a student at Hogwarts.

entities.name: fat lady
entities.description: A portrait that guards the entrance to Gryffindor Tower.

entities.name: percy
entities.description: A student who came through the crowd and asked what was going on.

relationships.description: The dementors send their love to Harry Potter, indicating that they are targeting him.
Nearly Headless Nick is a Gryffindor ghost.
Malfoy shouted through the crowd as they left the hall, targeting Harry Potter.
Percy came through the crowd and interacted with the Fat Lady.
